title: Sparkling Diamond Vanki Bangle - A Timeless Tradition
materials: Crafted in 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with carefully selected brilliant-cut diamonds. Gold has been alloyed for strength and is hallmarked for authenticity. Diamonds are VS clarity and G color.
features: This exquisite bangle features a continuous row of sparkling diamonds set within a beaded gold framework. The open 'V' shape, characteristic of the classic Vanki design, offers a modern twist on traditional elegance. The individual diamond settings are meticulously crafted for maximum brilliance. Secure clasp closure ensures comfortable wear.
colors: Warm yellow gold contrasted with the dazzling white of the diamonds creates a visually stunning effect.
occasions: and family celebrations. This vanki also makes a statement when paired with contemporary outfits for upscale parties or formal events.
description: A sophisticated blend of traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship guarantee a durable and treasured heirloom piece. The continuous diamond setting symbolizes enduring love and prosperity. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a unique luster, unmatched in its brilliance.
